steps.name: Open https://staging.freelancer.nl/
Disable cookies
Log in as recipient user
Click "LOG IN"
Enter email: AQA-CI-QonmT-750-U-Recip-ahfEb@mailsac.com
Enter password: AQA-CI-QonmT-750-U-Recip-ahfEb
Click "LOG IN"
Verify that the user is logged
Verify that the email message is correct
Verify that the recipient's first name in the email is AQA-CI-QonmT-750-U-Recip-ahfEb
Verify that the recipient's last name in the email is 75675
Verify that the custom msg in the email is rDqdEhIRCm
Verify that the organization name is AQA-CI-QonmT-750-U-Send-ahfEb
Follow the link from the mail: https://staging.freelancer.nl/account/organization/invite?token=0c279582aa56c4160fbe6f6df1526b13b10874b1ua0
Check invitation message
Verify that the message contain AQA-CI-QonmT-750-U-Send-ahfEb 16585
Verify that the organization name is AQA-CI-QonmT-750-U-Send-ahfEb
Click "Accept"
Open https://staging.freelancer.nl/account/settings/organization
Verify that the full name of the 0 user is AQA-CI-QonmT-750-U-Send-ahfEb 16585
Verify that the role of the 0 user is Account holder
Verify that the full name of the 1 user is AQA-CI-QonmT-750-U-Recip-ahfEb 75675
Verify that the role of the 1 user is Agent
Verify that the pending invitation has disappeared
